title: Tutorial Clue. Type 'HALLOWEEN2025' to unlock
text: I guard the things that tread the ground, yet I make no move, I make no sound. Open my door and look inside - the first step forward is where I hide.
answer: Behind the shoe closet door near the front of the house.

title: Clue 1
text: It's round and clear, with faces you know. Look underneath where love and memories show.
answer: Under the 'Our Family' snow globe.

title: Clue 2
text: It hangs where cold things hide behind, With days and nights all neatly lined. Turn the page or lift it high - Your next clue waits where the dates lie.
answer: Behind the October calendar on the refrigerator.

title: Clue 3
text: Where water runs and shadows creep, secrets hide where the pipes sleep. Open the door, don't overthink - your next clue waits beneath the sink.
answer: Behind the door of the cabinet under the sink in the basement bathroom.

title: Clue 4
text: I stand above the place that heats, beside some cups where thirst retreats. Find the green one, lift, and peek - your next clue hides beneath its seat. (QR Passcode: LANTERNSLIE)
answer: Under the green cup inside the cabinet above the microwave.

title: Clue 5
text: Not all warmth comes from light above, some hums below where shadows shove. A door that hums when meals awake, but down below, it's no mistake. Seek where the silence hides the wave - the heat of night guards what you crave. (QR Passcode: SHADOWINTHEMIRROR)
answer: Inside the microwave in the basement.

title: Clue 6
text: No wires bind, yet life I give, a silent pulse that helps things live. I hum without a sound or spark, and hide what waits behind the dark. (QR Passcode: THEHOLLOWHOUR)
answer: Behind the wireless phone charger in the salon room with the bed.

title: Clue 7
text: Where guests sit long and stories steep, a quiet choir hangs in keep. Not kettle's song, but mouths at rest - their hollow throats conceal the quest. Lift by the handle, tilt, and peek... the cup that hides what you now seek. (QR Passcode: ECHOESINTHEGRAVEYARD)
answer: Inside one of the tiny hanging mugs/teacups on the corner rack in the dining room.

title: Clue 8
text: Four faces hang, yet only one can see, the secrets kept by you and me. The bee may buzz, the cow may cheer, but wisdom whispers, 'the answer's here.' Behind the gaze that knows the night, your hidden clue awaits in sight. (QR Passcode: ROTTENSERENADE)
answer: Behind the owl plaque in the wall-hanging set between the front door and the office.

title: Clue 9
text: I'm neither salt nor sweet delight, yet bakers need me day and night. I hide where bags and boxes stack, a yellow guard upon the rack. Lift me up, but mind my mark - beneath my base, the path grows stark. (QR Passcode: BONECIPHER13)
answer: Under the Argo Corn Starch container in the kitchen cabinet.

title: Clue 10
text: A canvas of faces, bound in a frame, Whispers of colors, yet none look the same. It teaches creation but hides a design â€” Success in its pages, yet not every line. Seek not the first glance nor pages too few, For numbers conceal what pigments construe. Where lessons in blush and contour reside, The fifth holds the secret the rest cannot hide. (QR Passcode: CAMPCRYSTALECHO)
answer: Page five of the 'Blueprint for Success' salon guidebook.

title: Clue 11
text: Two flames watch over beauty in bloom, One guards the left, the other the room. Within the glass where shadows play, What hides beneath the light will show the way. (QR Passcode: BRAMRIDDLE)
answer: In the living room under the left candle on the wall beside the painting of flowers.

title: Clue 12
text: Three rest side by side, each silver and still, Hanging with stories, awaiting your will. The one in the middle keeps secrets confined- What you're searching for rests just behind. (QR Passcode: SALEMSCODE)
answer: In the kitchen behind the middle spoon of the three spoons hung on the wall.

title: Clue 13
text: In a room where color meets the eye, Bottled shades await nearby. Among them rests a glimmering green - Lift it up to see what's been unseen. (QR Passcode: GRAVEMISTAKE)
answer: The green nail polish that says 'bonita cosmetics' among the rack of nail polish on the wall.

title: Clue 14
text: Among cans and bottles stacked in rows, Where engines drink and grease still flows, A blue sentinel guards the grime - Look behind it, it's hiding this time. (QR Passcode: FRIGHTTRIANGLE)
answer: Behind the blue bottle in the storage in the garage that says 'SUPERTECH SAE 30 MOTOR OIL' on the second shelf.

title: Clue 15
text: Many faces share one frame, Each hides another, yet all the same. Peel back the layers, small to small - What seems the least may hold it all. (QR Passcode: SPECTERSYNTAX)
answer: The smallest doll of the matryoshka dolls behind the bar.

title: Clue 16
text: In rooms where life and laughter blend, Where meals are shared and days can end, The heart of the home holds wamrth and sound - Seek where voices and footsteps gather around. Not quite a throne, yet built to serve, Four legs steady, a simple curve. Beneath the seat of humble grace, Your next step hides in a modest place. (QR Passcode: HAUNTOLOGICAL)
answer: Under the stool in the kitchen.

title: Clue 17
text: The scent of morning hides the key, In a place where warmth begins for thee. Among the grounds where dreams awake, Behind the beans, the path you take. (QR Passcode: CRYPTOMNESIA)
answer: Behind the coffee bags in the middle shelf of the cabinet above the coffee maker in the kitchen.

title: Clue 18
text: You've searched these faces and thought it through, But some things hide in plain view. Within the painted shells you've held before, Lies something waiting - Just one more. Not the smallest, nor the largest kept, But the one where secrets quietly slept. Where halves align and colors meet, What you missed lies near the seat. (QR Passcode: DUSKTILLDREAD)
answer: Inside second smallest doll of the matryoshka doll set.

title: Clue 19
text: Among the tools that bring the fizz, Lies something more than bubbles and whizz. Beside the stream that never flows, The cap conceals what no one knows. (QR Passcode: 3AMWHISPER)
answer: Inside the black cap of one of the SodaStream bottles next to the SodaStream machine in the kitchen next to the fridge.

title: Clue 20
text: Wrapped and folded, soft disguise, Layers hide what meets the eyes. Seek the place where warmth is found, Then lift your gaze - it's higher ground. The ceiling guards what hands can't reach, Above the calm, the truth will breach. When comfort blinds, your search will stall - Salvation waits above it all. (QR Passcode: DEADENDATDAWN)
answer: In the closet filled with blankets upstairs, on the ceiling.

title: $25 Gift Card Clue
text: The end now calls, your path runs low, Through tests of mind and undertow. You've sought through warmth and bitter chill, What waits for those of iron will. In halls where tales of might remain, Lies thunder's heir, at rest, in chain. Its head once fell with righteous sound, Now silent, still, upon the ground. A chest of gray and gold entwined, Conceals the gift the gods resigned. Its keeper waits where hearth meets hall, Where strength once struck, now dares not fall. Seek not for flame nor shining blade, But weight that only storm has made. Beneath the sleep of timeless war, Your final truth waits - evermore. (QR Passcode: THETHIRTEENTHECHO)
answer: Thor's hammer in the God of War Ragnarok Collector's edition box in the corner of the family room.
